overview:
David Krauser is a Senior Associate in the Highland Consumer Fund assisting with investments in the retail, consumer goods and services sector. He is actively involved in Highland Consumer Fund’s investments in Castor & Pollux Pet Works and O Beverages.

Background Prior to joining Highland, David worked on the Retail Finance Team at CapitalSource Finance LLC, a commercial lending firm, where he financed middle market private equity buyouts of retail and consumer companies. Prior to CapitalSource, David worked at Wellington Management, an asset management firm in Boston.

degrees.subject: Economics and Law Jurisprudence and Social Thought
